channel.title: Need one to script a prayer script take a look
channel.description:
ok im now where a prayer scrip can be but i cant script so that one that wonna make a script can do it
in the house out side varroks west bank its a letter if you go down then you see giants and longest in to the cave is a spawning point fo bones its two spawning points just to chose whits wonna you wonna make a script on
i hope someone wonna make a prayer script ;D ;D ;D
(sorry for my bad english)

item.title: Need one to script a prayer script take a look
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

I wrote this a while ago, Im not sure by your description, but I think this is what you want:

[code]
program m0u53m4tsboneman;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////m0u53m4ts Bone Man V3\\\\\\\\\\\\\
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////////////Setup\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////////////////1. Set to low detail\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////2. Set screen to 32 bit\\\\\\\\\\\\
////3. Drag crosshairs over runescape every time you start the script\
////////////////4. Have no white items in your inventory\\\\\\\\
/////////////5. Start where there are lots of bones around\\\\\\\
///////////////////////////6. Setup line 28\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////7. Donate via paypal to junk4owen@hotmail.com\\\\\\
////////////8. Enjoy the awesomeness of my first ever script\\\\\\
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////////////////////////Note\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////I work under 2 alias’s, Junior and m0u53m4t.\\\\\\\
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

Var
xv,yv,x1,y1,bonesininvent,bonesimg,dropped,
picked,picktries,logoutwhen,Numberofbones,
rightclickbones,rightclickbones2: Integer;

procedure Numberoftrips;
begin

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Numberofbones := 2000
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

end;

const StartPlayer = 0; // Determines who will play first

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=2; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

 Players[0].Name :='lvl 3 dog';
 Players[0].Pass :='3px571';
 Players[0].Nick :='lvl 3 dog';
 Players[0].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[0].Skill:='Prayer';
 Players[0].Active:=True;

 Players[1].Name :='h1tchh1k3r5';
 Players[1].Pass :='mynewaccountrules';
 Players[1].Nick :='h1tchh1k3r5';
 Players[1].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[1].Skill:='Mining';
 Players[1].Active:=True;

 Players[2].Name :='';
 Players[2].Pass :='';
 Players[2].Nick :='';
 Players[2].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[2].Skill:='';
 Players[2].Active:=True;

 writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers)+' Players');

end;

procedure openbag;
begin
mouse(632,174,8,8,true)
end;

procedure findbones;
begin

bonesimg := BitmapFromString(40, 11, ‘z78DADD54411283200C’ +
‘FC1268053C0AF4FF5F92E9D24E308432D8E9010F7B888BB29B4D6’ +
‘2707635B144F74635DD038DE1B08F75D1BB3E9401A6CAB62EC0A9’ +
‘F47A674ABD171F925E7D68AFCC84FD25BA90E7ACD7EBA0EC7C7A8’ +
‘1747EE180D4DF1813C772AC309F6E4F6F0514EFF6233E3D3536BF’ +
‘541DBA0F0CFE75CA5F4FE18FF4AD0E3A7EE303C11CE373E47A2B7’ +
‘966FD85D27C7392F6FE7AFE3BF10115EE4F4F1D0F7543CAC3675F’ +
‘6DD5F9F5F5F9BDAFB75F17BF3FED17CF5E3B0F63FBEA9F7AA5647’ +
‘66D27F69D3BFBAAF05F98E8311FDAF9ACA4B4B9A9B84B7453656C’ +
‘2A2DF243D471A512B3A7CEF3D9EE720FF3049CD81E0A’);

   rightclickbones := BitmapFromString(41, 10, 'z78DAED94310EC0200845AFC4A069' +
   'BA37FFFE47326987D228081A8943191840A34FF91F008870E77CE' +
   '5948ED51938299194A3EEF0523F1149CD23927D076ABDFE53AFA3' +
   '86AA74DEC59027E8BAE661D935E61B12457DBAD4F5B27B753DB39' +
   'EEFFAD6FBBCBA16BC1AF14EF87CDD42ED9D6DFDAD76A06ECD8055' +
   'D712A39D7767EA9AD1FEE3F16ED6F29F3E750190D5198C');

   rightclickbones2 := BitmapFromString(45, 10, 'z78DAED95410AC0200C04BFE44129' +
   'BD97FDFF930A2D4541936EAA9514BA070F318138242B9095B614E' +
   '3F2F609AC2106E99CD383DC5B5638349346290F4C3CD0D0E33F0D' +
   '3F34A03A09048DF28D524CD5285FBA72DAAABB926EAD4CACBED19' +
   '35F5671F9F71CF49DB2EE9A7553FAE3350D299F9F7CA892187AA0' +
   'C1C779DF90DECE73F8228DFAEDFC84CC77D196BF3DF9B3CEF80EE' +
   '74656CC');

     bonesininvent := BitmapFromString(23, 13, 'z78DAAD545B8E8430' +
   '0CBB52296D9A7CE601F73FD266311F8C6619C1B0AD8454A089ED3' +
   '829E5D69A8ECF8597BE749F4D4D0FEF4B70D4A816D6ACBDDF2ADF' +
   'AF3D425850EEE2929B324F98D994BBE8AC332FDCB8ED48347AF4F' +
   'CAB7A35D63C2A898A486162BACEF4F8F470CA5D4D8C6DA8AB711D' +
   '3AF4E3AD3D6644488830073B97C1834968A25365A030F822AFADD' +
   '6AD6B4B0E3C062D14C3C63CEA7585A10990DFACCE04CDA3259600' +
   '725A53487EA9CEFA2B33F439C54091B10E18BEF483A9AEBA9CE14' +
   'F90293434DF945BDFF982CBE78A5FA86CF1666EA75C5EBCBA6196' +
   '45669951477CC51BAB4A4AF02A3A0891E1E15DFFEEABAF70056E5' +
   'D970CDD8A2C5AA44B4F27CE5C11D3DDBBB794AB4AD52A43D2D899' +
   'D0124D9E776C5BD5D0719E35CCF3C6E2ABEEFEABBF36A699A368B' +
   '95E0B6B2ACA504C88B3359FF82A6A2AE1E0FB1D2F6838EA26F303' +
   '4DE084C34C9B1E4CCE1B0B333C1DC13ED03B983C8F67F8EDB53B1' +
   '3337CAB720EBE65C47F21F901D2A26D9F');

SetTransparentColor(bonesimg, 0)
SetTransparentColor(bonesininvent, 0)
repeat
begin

repeat
begin
picktries := attempts + 1
if picktries > 30 then
logout
wait(200+random(200))
if(random(2)=1) then
begin
findnormalrandoms
end;
end;
until(FindColorTolerance(xv,yv, 13224400, 10, 30, 516, 337, 5)=true)

mmouse(xv,yv,0,0)
wait(random(50+random(50)))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(bonesimg,x1,y1,40,7,80,25,260)=true) THEN
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x1,y1, 3769056, 40, 7, 80, 25, 20)) then
mouse(xv,yv,2,2,false)
if(findbitmaptolerancein(rightclickbones,xv,yv,8,22,514,336,20)=true) or (findbitmaptolerancein(rightclickbones2,xv,yv,8,22,514,336,20)=true) then
begin
wait(200+random(10))
mouse(xv,yv,2,2,true)
wait(100+random(50))
findnormalrandoms
picked := 1
wait(3000 + random(500))
end;
end;
wait(random(100))
if random(3) >1 then
SendArrowSilentWait(1, 50 + random(500));
if(random(2)=1) then findnormalrandoms
end;
until(picked = 1)
picktries := 0
attempts := 0
end;

procedure dropbones;
begin

if FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(bonesininvent,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=true then
begin
repeat
begin
mouse(xv+7+random(5),yv+10+random(5),1,1,true)
wait(800+random(100))
dropped := dropped + 1
findnormalrandoms
wait(500+random(1000))
logoutwhen := logoutwhen + 1
end;
until(FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(bonesininvent,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=false)
end;
end;

procedure update;
begin
if(random(50))=1 then
begin
Writeln(‘Number of bones buried :’);
Writeln(inttostr(logoutwhen));
findnormalrandoms
end;
end;

begin
ActivateClient
SetupSRL;
numberoftrips
HighestAngle
setrun(true)
openbag
repeat
findbones
antiban
dropbones
antiban
findNormalRandoms
if random(25) = 1 then
begin
setrun(true)
openbag
end;
update
until(logoutwhen > Numberofbones)
Logout
writeln(‘logged out’)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
